title: Group portrait of Pelmon - Brown wedding party with six men, including Chester Driesbach, Ernest Perkins, Richelieu Davis, Lathia Gaddie, Howard Mills, and groom James N. Brown, in center, and six women, including Rozena Pelmon, Beulah DeVaughn, Mary Young, Alma Frazier, Geraldine Baker, and bride Nellie Pelmon Brown wearing gown with tulle skirt and sheer long sleeved floral overlay, mid-length veil with small head piece, and eyeglasses, posed in Community Baptist Church, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
